description: Try our easy to follow Marinara Seafood Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish cake,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood,Low sugar,Sesame free,Baking,Potato,Microwave,High protein,Easter
name: Marinara Seafood Cakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, rind finely grated (and 2 tbs juice)
500g marinara seafood mix (available from the seafood counter)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes in the microwave following packet directions until tender. Transfer to a large bowl and roughly mash. Finely chop marinara mix and add to potato with 1/3 cup flour, 1 egg, dill, lemon rind and juice. Chop half of the capers and stir into mixture. Season with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper. Stir well to combine. Form 1/2cup quantities of mixture into patties and place on a large tray.

Place the breadcrumbs in a bowl. Whisk the remaining 2 eggs in a shallow dish. Lightly coat the seafood cakes with the remaining 1/3 cup flour, then dip into egg and coat with breadcrumbs. Place on a tray.

Heat half of the oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add the remaining capers and cook for 3 minutes or until they burst into flowers. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towel. Cook seafood cakes, in batches, for 4 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a tray and cover to keep warm. Top with caper flowers. Serve with aioli, lemon wedges and green salad.
